H0.text: What was the name of Shari Lewis' sassy sock puppet. Charlie

H1.text: What was the name of Shari Lewis' sassy sock puppet. Socky

H2.text: What was the name of Shari Lewis' sassy sock puppet. Lola

H3.text: What was the name of Shari Lewis' sassy sock puppet. Lambchop

A4.text: She famously created and performed the sock puppet Lamb Chop for Captain Kangaroo in March 1956.
